text: Campeonato Brasileiro Série A is a football league in Brazil. ==Clubs 2021== * América Mineiro * Atlético Mineiro * Atlético Paranaense * Bahia * Chapecoense * Corinthians * Cuiabá * Juventude * Red Bull Bragantino * Flamengo * Fluminense * Grêmio * Internacional * Palmeiras * Fortaleza * Ceará * Santos * São Paulo * Sport * Atlético Goianiense ===Champions=== ==Titles by Clubs== Titles Clubs 10 Palmeiras 8 Santos, Flamengo 7 Corinthians 6 São Paulo 4 Vasco da Gama,Fluminense 3 Internacional,Cruzeiro 2 Grêmio, Botafogo, Bahia 1 Atlético Mineiro, Guarani, Atlético Paranaense, Coritiba, Sport Recife ==Related pages== * Campeonato Brasileiro Série B * Campeonato Brasileiro Série C Category:1959 establishments Category:1950s establishments in Brazil
title: Campeonato Brasileiro Série A
